name: Save new Printavo orders to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new order is created in Printavo, Make will automatically add it to a new row in a Google Sheet spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1g2hkn6PSp-vji6Hnmzj6zaSTpBLZD_9GvRpEDDVn9ic/edit?usp=sharing).
